document_data.name: Armoghh's Armoire of Arms and Armor
document_data.mainbody: '''Armoghh's Armoire of Arms and Armor''' was a store in [[Loudwater]] in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: It stood on the bank of the [[Delimbiyr River]], conveniently located opposite the [[Loudwater Hall of Training]].
document_data.Services: In business by [[1358 DR]], the store sold [[weapon]]s and, presumably, [[armor]].
